description.value:
As a maneuver, you can touch an object with a size equal to [[lookup @P]]{your Presence score} or smaller and place a protective spell on it. The object has immunity all to untyped damage. You can maintain this spell on a number of objects equal to [[lookup @P]]{your Presence score}, and you can end the spell on any object at any time (no action required).

Additionally, you can place this spell on a building or vehicle (or a similar structure with the Directorâ€™s approval) that is of a size larger than [[lookup @P]]{your Presence score}. You can place the spell on only one such target at a time, and you can maintain the spell on a larger target and a number of objects equal to [[lookup @P]]{your Presence score} simultaneously.
